tr_errorHeaderText: Ayɔnkofa, enti nea aka no yi a wɔpɛ sɛ obi ka
tr_errorActionText: Ɛrɔr bɔɔ. Soronko saa enti bisa Organized. Saa ara nea edi a, sɛ wobɛtwe abakɔsɛm a edi kan no. Sɛ odi anɔpa ama wɔn a wɔde edi kan no, onni nokware.
tr_updateDescription: Owerɛhunu a ɔdɔɔ Organized wɔ mu no wɔ mu
tr_errorGeneric: Ayɔnkofa, enti nea aka no yi
tr_appAboutDesc:
Organized yɛ ɛdɛn biara so bi a Jehovah’s Witnesses asafoɔ hyɛ no. Aben biara a yɛn hyɛ no ho yɛ mpanim biara, na ɛkasa ase ne ɛkasa nso biara nyinaa.

Hyɛ ase nnawɔtwe ne nnawɔtwe awieɛ nhyiam nkaho a wɔbɛpam nnipa a wɔreyɛ ase no, bisa akɔneɛ ne nkɔmbɔtɔ. Organized so, aboa mu mma obiara ho ntumi nka.

Yɛde asɛm biara di bi a, yɛbɛbɔ yɛn nkɔso a wɔwɔ mu. Wopɛ sɛ yɛbɛbrɛ nea yɛbɔ sɛ nea yɛbɛte sɛ ɛko Organized mu ho no. Wobɛyɛ adwuma afi gyidi mu sɛ yɛda a edi akyiri.
tr_supportAppDesc: Organized wɔ mu no yɛ nsa frɛ asafoɔ. Yɛde yɛn hyɛ mpanim yi ase bi na yɛde aboa ne nkamfo di no ho. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ yɛhyɛ akyɛ a, ɛbɛma yɛn firi yɛn mpɛmpɛnnie yɛn.
tr_supportAppOption1Desc: Adom bɔ ɔdɔɔ Organized yi mu. Nea ɛbɔ no aboa amane ahyɛ Organized so na yɛn ani gye abakɔsɛm bɔɔ. Na adom bi no yɛ ɔdɔ a wɔnni asafoɔ so no.
tr_supportAppOption2Desc:
Yɛhyɛ wo nsa so wɔ ntoro biara:

  • React Development
  • UI/UX Design
  • App Akan

Sɛ woatumi akɔ saa nsɛm yi a, ma yɛn fa saa. Yɛbɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ nkyerɛase Organized no mu na yɛada no nkɔm.

Sɛ woapaw Organized no kasa wɔ mu no, afebɔɔ asafoɔ, na wɔakasa ano ne nnipa nso no wɔ mu.
tr_internalError: Ayɔnkofa a wɔpɛ sɛ yɛbɔɔ kwan so yi. Ma yɛn sɛ wobisabisani anaa wɔkwan nkyerɛase.
